ARABIC: وَٱلْخَٰمِسَةَ أَنَّ غَضَبَ ٱللَّهِ عَلَيْهَآ إِن كَانَ مِنَ ٱلصَّٰدِقِينَ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: and a fifth time that Allah's anger will be upon her if he is telling the truth.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: Her fifth oath being that the curse of God be on her if her husband should be speaking the truth.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: and the fifth time she invokes Allah's wrath upon herself, if he be true (in his charge).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: On the fifth time she should say, "Let the curse of God be upon me if what he says is true."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: And the fifth time, that the wrath of Allah be upon her if the man is truthful.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: And the fifth; should be that the wrath of Allah be upon her if he speaks the truth.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: And the fifth (time) that the wrath of Allah be on her if he is one of the truthful.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: and a fifth time, that the wrath of God shall be upon her, if he should be of the truthful.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: And a fifth (time) that the wrath of Allah be upon her if he speaketh truth.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: and, a fifth time that God's wrath will be upon her if he is telling the truth.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: And the fifth that Allah's wrath be upon her if he is of the truthtellers.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: and a fifth [oath] that Allah’s wrath shall be upon her if he were stating the truth.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: And the fifth (oath) should be that she solemnly invokes the wrath of Allah on herself if (her accuser) is telling the truth.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: And the fifth (testimony) should be that the Wrath of Allah be upon her if he (her husband) speaks the truth.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: and on the fifth time the Wrath of Allah shall be upon her if he is of the truthful.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: And the fifth time, that God’s wrath be upon her, if he is truthful.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: And the fifth [oath will be] that the wrath of Allah be upon her if he was of the truthful.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [24:9] and a fifth time that God’s wrath shall be upon her if he were being truthful, therein.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (And a fifth (time) that the wrath of Allah be upon her) upon the wife (if he) her husband (speaketh truth) is true about what he says about her.
